page.title: 16SKELMORLIE LIFE STYLES
page.content: Fashion in Skelmorlie is informal. People like to be up to date without being extreme. Jogging suits are ideal for village life for all ages.Baggy trousers drawn in at the ankles with lots of pockets,coloured socks and jackie boots are the present craze for teenagers. Many boys are wearing wrist bands, neck chains,rings and ear-rings now- adays,although older males like our fathers don't wear such things,only wrist watches and wedding rings. There is no organised "night life" in Skelmorlie for teenagers or young folk Regular discos are held in Greenock or Largs. Some of the older people go to the "pub" or local hotel for a drink. Families go out together to a local hotel for a meal on a special occasion such as a birthday.
